name: graphql
description: A Query Language and Runtime which can target any service.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run check && npm run testonly
scripts.test:ci: npm run lint -- --no-cache && npm run check && npm run testonly:cover
scripts.testonly:cover: nyc --clean --skip-full --reporter json --reporter html --reporter text -- npm run testonly
scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:cp && npm run build:package-json && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:mjs && npm run build:flow
scripts.build:mjs: npm run build:js -- --env-name mjs --out-dir dist/module && for file in $(find dist/module -name '*.js'); do mv "$file" `echo "$file" | sed 's/dist\/module/dist/g; s/.js$/.mjs/g'`; done && rm -rf dist/module
scripts.build:flow: for file in $(find ./src -name '*.js' -not -path '*/__fixtures__*' -not -path '*/__tests__*'); do cp "$file" `echo "$file" | sed 's/\/src\//\/dist\//g'`.flow; done
